title: mc启动不了
txt_content:
错误发生在进入存档后，java版本为8，mc版本任何都会

错误日志：
 A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment:
#
#  EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x00007ff8911d6b37, pid=5820, tid=3432
#
# JRE version: Java(TM) SE Runtime Environment (8.0_25-b18) (build 1.8.0_25-b18)
# Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (25.25-b02 mixed mode windows-amd64 compressed oops)
# Problematic frame:
# C  [ig8icd64.dll+0x16b37]
#
# Failed to write core dump. Minidumps are not enabled by default on client versions of Windows
#
# An error report file with more information is saved as:
# C:\Users\25294\AppData\Roaming\.minecraft\hs_err_pid5820.log
#
# If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit:
#   file:///C:/Users/25294/AppData/Local/Temp/%25W@GJ$ACOF(TYDYECOKVDYB.pnghttp://bugreport.sun.com/bugreport/crash.jsp
# The crash happened outside the Java Virtual Machine in native code.
# See problematic frame for where to report the bug.
#
AL lib: (EE) alc_cleanup: 1 device not closed
Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM warning: Using incremental CMS is deprecated and will likely be removed in a future release

replies.author: DispelAer
replies.txt_content: 小伙子这个不是错误日志
你的Java与电脑程序发生了冲突

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content:
Q:提示“EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005)”错误提示时如何修复?
答:造成原因有很多，可能是显卡，可能是OpenGL（3D加速）也可能是Java问题
如何知道具体是哪个呢？
在崩溃信息内查找“problematic frame”部分
如果是ig4icd32.dll, ig4dev32.dll, ig7icd64.dll, ig7dev64.dll，那么是就显卡问题你可以尝试更新显卡，或者你如果有其他显卡就转换其他显卡。
如果是atioglx1.dll, atioglx2.dll, atioglx3.dll, atioglxx.dll，那么是OpenGL（3D加速）问题，更新ATi或Nvidia（或其他）根据自己电脑配设而言。
如果是jvm.dll, libjvm.so，那么就需要更新Java（卸载其余Java版本）。
